verbose_text: When we restricted expression of TrpA1 exclusively to a single class of aSP13 neurons, using VT5526-LexA, LexAop-TrpA1 (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY; B.J. Dickson, personal communication) males incubated at 32degreesC from 8 to 10 hr post-training fully consolidated long-term memory in contrast to genetic control under the same conditions or control flies that remained at 22degreesC throughout (XREF_FIG B; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
